mapper.select: select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_msg, s.original_price, s.promote_price, s.stock, s.cate_id, s.title, si.shop_img_id,si.shop_img from shop s left join shop_image si on si.shop_id = s.shop_id where s.shop_id = #{id}

select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_msg, s.original_price, s.promote_price, s.stock, s.cate_id, s.title, si.shop_img_id,si.shop_img from shop s left join shop_image si on si.shop_id = s.shop_id where s.shop_name = #{name} limit 1

select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_msg, s.original_price, s.promote_price, s.stock, s.cate_id, s.title, si.shop_img_id,si.shop_img from shop s left join shop_image si on si.shop_id = s.shop_id where s.shop_name like concat(concat('%',#{kw}),'%') or s.shop_msg like concat(concat('%',#{kw}),'%')
